title: Airport Check-in
description: Navigate the airport check-in process with confidence

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Good morning! May I see your passport and booking confirmation?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Thank you. I see you're flying to Los Angeles today. Are you checking any bags?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Yes, I have one suitcase to check and one carry-on.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Please place your suitcase on the scale. Do you have a seat preference?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I'd prefer a window seat if possible.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: I have a window seat available in row 24. Is that okay?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Your bag weighs 22 kilograms, which is within the limit. Here's your boarding pass.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Thank you. Which gate should I go to?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Your flight departs from Gate B12. Boarding begins at 10:30 AM.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Got it. Is there a lounge I can use?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Yes, there's a lounge near Gate B8. Have a safe flight!

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Thank you so much. Have a nice day!
